mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, NICKNAME, SEQ_CLASS, CONTENT, RDATE, DEL, REF, STEP, DEPTH FROM COMMENT_CLASS WHERE SEQ_CLASS = ${seq_class} AND DEL = 0 ORDER BY REF asc, RDATE asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT_CLASS(SEQ, NICKNAME, SEQ_CLASS, CONTENT, RDATE, DEL, REF, STEP, DEPTH) VALUES(SEQ_COMMENT_CLASS.NEXTVAL, #{nickname}, #{seq_class}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, (SELECT NVL(MAX(REF)+1, 0) FROM COMMENT_CLASS), 0, 0 )

INSERT INTO COMMENT_CLASS(SEQ, NICKNAME, SEQ_CLASS, CONTENT, RDATE, DEL, REF, STEP, DEPTH) VALUES(SEQ_COMMENT_CLASS.NEXTVAL, #{nickname}, #{seq_class}, ' ', SYSDATE, 0, (SELECT REF FROM COMMENT_CLASS WHERE SEQ=#{seq}), (SELECT STEP FROM COMMENT_CLASS WHERE SEQ=#{seq}) + 1, (SELECT DEPTH FROM COMMENT_CLASS WHERE SEQ=#{seq}) + 1)
